HostRound LLC is a US-based web hosting provider found to stay ahead and provide unmatched service level with exceptional support.

We provide Web hosting and WordPress hosting in the USA with unmatched service level and top-notch support that pushes you to success.
We also provide a*free Website Builder with premium features that allow you to build your professional looking and responsive website yourself with a few clicks, you can try our website builder DEMO.

What do we offer?
  • Websites hosted on 12 Cores / 24 Threads Intel Xeon CPU Servers
  • Pure SAMSUNG SSD storage for ultimate speed
  • Amazing uptime of 99.999%
  • Tier-3 Data center
  • Daily backup in two secured locations
  • FREE Website Builder with advanced features
  • Free Migration from your old provider
  • Install Apps with 1 Click
  • PHP version selector + php modules selector
  • Native support for WordPress, Joomla & Drupal
  • Real-time protection against 4000+ exploit scripts
  • Real-time protection against malware and viruses uploaded to your site via FTP/Browser/Email/File manager
  • Free Cloudflare CDN service
  • Secured and isolated hosting environment with CloudLinux OS
  • Pre-installed Git and WP-CLI
  • SSH Access
  • Rebootless kernel updates for enhanced security & ZERO downtime
  • Web & FTP upload protected against malicious software
  • Two-factor authentication on cPanel login and client portal
  • Discounted WEB DESIGN when you sign up for a web hosting plan, starting from $299.99 for 1-5 pages website.
